alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 10:43AM EST until January 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, until 1 AM EST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4301 7812 4310 7822 4310 7848 4307 7880 4298 7902 4288 7889 4272 7903 4278 7875 4287 7856 4291 7831 TIME Y22M01D06T1500Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
